Match the HTML attribute with its function.

pairs.src: Defines the source of an image
pairs.href: Defines the destination of a hyperlink
pairs.alt: Provides alternative text for an image
pairs.title: Provides additional information about an element

questions.question: Which of these are valid HTML5 elements?
Match the HTML element with its purpose.

pairs.article: Defines an independent section of content
pairs.aside: Defines content aside from the page content
pairs.main: Defines the main content of a document
pairs.footer: Defines the footer section of a document

correct: A clickable link with text 'Click Here' that goes to https://example.com
